name: Trinity
description: First fission device test, first plutonium implosion detonation

name: Little Boy
description: Bombing of Hiroshima, Japan, first detonation of an enriched uranium gun-type device, first use of a nuclear device in military combat.

name: Fat Man
description: Bombing of Nagasaki, Japan, second and last use of a nuclear device in military combat.

name: Tsar Bomba
description: Largest thermonuclear weapon ever tested—scaled down from its initial 100 Mt design by 50%

name: Test No. 6
description: First "staged" thermonuclear weapon test by the People's Republic of China

name: Chelyabinsk Meteor
description: First fission weapon (boosted) test by Pakistan

name: Brent Crater
description: First fission weapon (boosted) test by Pakistan

name: Chicxulub Event
description: First fission weapon (boosted) test by Pakistan
